function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delays in COVID-19 test results","Impact":"Increases the risk of unwitting disease spread and delays patient treatment","Mitigation":"Implement rapid testing methods to obtain results more quickly","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic testing devices, point-of-care testing tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare providers, diagnostic laboratories, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reduced performance due to virus transport medium","Impact":"Potential for false-negative results in low positive samples","Mitigation":"Avoid diluting samples below the assay's limit of detection","Technologies":"Direct swab testing without elution in virus transport medium","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, testing laboratories","Owner":"Healthcare providers, diagnostic laboratories"},{"Description":"Inadequate testing volume","Impact":"Limiting the ability to test a high volume of patients in a timely manner","Mitigation":"Increase manufacturing capacity of rapid test units","Technologies":"Manufacturing technology for rapid test units","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare providers"}]}
